definition[0]: a very offensive word for someone, especially a man, who you think is stupid or annoying
definition[1]: used to refer to a person
example[1]: The poor sod's wife left him.
definition[2]: a piece of earth or the layer of earth with grass and roots growing in it
type[0]: transitive only in imperative or infinitive
definition[3]: used to say rudely that something is not important
example[3]: Sod the job, Iâ€™m going home.
